doc.field: Frederic Ewen Audiotape and Videotape Collection
Frederic Ewen Audiotape and Videotape Collection
Series III: Readings by Frederic Ewen
Series III: Readings by Frederic Ewen

This series includes Ewen's private readings recorded on audiocassette tapes between 1954 and 1990. In these years, Ewen read and took notes on books and literary works, and recorded passages from many books and his comments about them on tape.
